metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2092 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site Scripting (XSS) in Dolibarr ERP/CRM 3.3.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML in functions.lib.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2092` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dolibarr - 3.5.8+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.8+dfsg1-1ubuntu1').
